all.title: ðŸ“„ Australian Student Visa (Subclass 500)
all.content:
**Key Requirements for Australian Student Visa**

**Mandatory Documents:**
1. Confirmation of Enrollment (CoE) from CRICOS institution
2. Genuine Temporary Entrant (GTE) statement
3. Financial capacity proof (1 year tuition + living)
4. English proficiency: IELTS 5.5-7.0 or equivalent
5. Overseas Student Health Cover (OSHC)
6. Health examination (if required)
7. Police clearance certificate

**GTE Statement Must Include:**
â€¢ Why you chose Australia and the specific course
â€¢ How it relates to your previous study/work
â€¢ How it will help your future career
â€¢ Ties to home country

**Processing Time:**
â€¢ Standard: 1-3 months
â€¢ Priority: 2-4 weeks (complete applications)
â€¢ Post-study work: 485 visa options available

**2024 Updates:**
â€¢ Simplified GTE requirements
â€¢ Extended post-study work rights for select occupations
â€¢ Temporary relaxation of work hour limits

all.title: ðŸ“„ Canadian Study Permit Requirements
all.content:
**Study Permit Application Process**

**Required Documents:**
1. Letter of Acceptance (LOA) from DLI institution
2. Proof of financial support
3. Immigration Medical Exam (IME)
4. Police clearance certificate
5. Biometrics (fingerprints & photo)
6. Statement of Purpose (SOP)
7. Proof of ties to home country

**Financial Proof Options:**
â€¢ Guaranteed Investment Certificate (GIC): CAD 10,000
â€¢ First year tuition payment proof
â€¢ Education loan from bank
â€¢ Bank statements (4 months)
â€¢ Scholarship/funding letters

**Processing Pathways:**
â€¢ Student Direct Stream (SDS): 20 calendar days
â€¢ Regular Study Permit: 12 weeks
â€¢ Quebec: Additional CAQ required (2-4 weeks)

**Post-Graduation Work Permit:**
â€¢ Duration based on program length
â€¢ Maximum 3 years for programs 2+ years
â€¢ Can work while waiting for PGWP

â€¢ Tuberculosis test (if from listed country)
â€¢ Academic qualifications
â€¢ ATAS certificate (for sensitive subjects)

**Financial Requirements:**
â€¢ Course fees for first year
â€¢ Living costs: Â£1,334/month (London) or Â£1,023/month (outside)
â€¢ Funds must be held for 28 consecutive days

**Visa Fees:**
â€¢ Standard visa: Â£490
â€¢ Healthcare surcharge: Â£470 per year
â€¢ Priority service: Â£500 additional

**Processing Time:**

â€¢ Priority: 5 working days
â€¢ Super priority: Next working day
